alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cheyenne and southeastern Morrill Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 808 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Broadwater, or 31 miles north of Sidney, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Dalton, Gurley, Court House And Jail Rocks, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 and Broadwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
